data.name: Otherworld Legends - Jadetalon
data.detailed_description:
Jadetalon

A feisty battlemaiden with a petite build and uncanny brawn who mows down enemies with graceful sweeps of her prodigious glaive. She is apparently the co-owner of a strange mirror that grants passage to a number of different worlds, and has falled into the illusory realm created by Asurendra during a training tour alongside her sister.
data.about_the_game:
Jadetalon

A feisty battlemaiden with a petite build and uncanny brawn who mows down enemies with graceful sweeps of her prodigious glaive. She is apparently the co-owner of a strange mirror that grants passage to a number of different worlds, and has falled into the illusory realm created by Asurendra during a training tour alongside her sister.
data.short_description: This content requires the base game Otherworld Legends 战魂铭人 on Steam in order to play.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Japanese, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Korean, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: DirectX 9.1+ or OpenGL 3.2+
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 / Radeon HD 7800 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: DirectX 9.1+ or OpenGL 3.2+
